reviewText: It looks in good condition. It is for my daughter for Christmas. I will give an update after Christmas. Thanks
I love this DVD! Even though it's just one episode it's one that I could watch a ton of times! I love glee!

Everything I have ever bought through Amazon has had great quality even the used cd's and DVD's. I absolutely love GLee and I am enjoying all that I have bought.  I have never had a bad experience through Amazon.
Many holiday songs sang with a new sound.
This was a present for my daughter in law. She loves this show.
Excellent!
This episode is included in a season series. However, for the price I ordered it as it is great to watch during the holidays without having to search through the entire season for this episode.
I love it.

Where the actually show was great, I was under the impression that I was purchasing a "movie" but instead it was just a single epsode with a Christmas theme.  Had I known that I would not have spent that much money:(

I purchased the different Seasons and thought this was a Special that just didn't air on TV - when I learned that this was just their Christmas episode that was already on one of the tapes I already have, I was very disappointed.  I didn't need it twice!
love it
BEST CHRISTMAS SPECIAL EVER MADE, SURE TO BE A FOREVER FAVORITE CLASSIC FOR ANYONE THAT OWNS IT!
this a very good glee Christmas movies it made us really enjoy it .you and your family will too. thanks
This DVD is already in the First Season of Glee.  So if you have that season you will already have this.  Was a brand new copy.
didn't realize this was same episode in season 2, would not have bought if I had read the description. But the episode is really good if you do not own season 2.
Great to have the episode on a single DVD for the holidays. Great quality and great performance from the glee cast !!!
loved it, it is definitely glee, if you have the series it is in one of them, but seems nice just to have a separate one to watch around the holidays
was very happy with this series, I will add it to my Christmas collection. I watch it over and over
A heartwarming Glee Christmas to share.....there really is Christmas magic!  BELIEVE! It will become your Glee Christmas classic! Heartwarming. Wonderful!

Now with Cory gone, how I wish Season II & III's Christmas will be compiled in this format. As you view it, both happy & sad memories of Cory & his gang flash past me! This video is now part of my prized collections of DVDs now.

If you are a GLEE fan and own each season, why would you rebuy 1 episode already avaialble as part of a season?  (If you don't own the seasons I could see the purchase.)  But otherwise FOX is trying the "Disney Double Dip". Not very cool.

I love, love, love GLEE.  I can't get enough of it, especially Darren Criss.  I own most of the cd's and Season 2 & 3 on DVD.  I was lucky enough to see the live show when they toured about three years ago. AMAZING!!..
my favorite episode
Ordered for a friend off their Wish List.
Bad
My granddaughter was so surprised when I gave the whole series to her for Christmas. She loves it.
not the one I thought it was.
this is literally one glee episode on a dvd. sure it's fine if that's what you want and it's your favorite of all time but otherwise just go on netflix and watch it for free :)
given as a gift
Love it.
Added to movie collection
not sure was a gift
